content.rendered:
Central Florida Fence Contractor

Boundaries outside.
Freedom Inside.

Protect your property with a strong yet stylish fence – the perfect backdrop for family BBQ’s, safe backyard fun, or undisturbed business growth.

Get A Fence Quote
View Our Work

Easy financing available

High quality fence options

HOA installations welcome

20+ years of experience

At Local Choice Fence, we see beyond wood and nails

We view your fence as a frame for core outdoor memories: children roaming freely, secure business meetings. Even those well-deserved naps in the yard.

But as a reliable fence contractor in Pasco and Polk county, our main job is helping you keep things in (or out) 24/7.

And with a team of expert fence installers able to tackle any sized project – we have the confidence and competence to get the job done.

Contact Us
  • Enhance safety
Hand-crafted with care, our fences stand tall against unwanted guests and unpredictable weather.
  • Unlock memories
Start to dream bigger about how you use your space, free of restrictions or concerns.
  • Boost value
It’s more than a purchase. It’s a long-lasting upgrade that elevates your property’s worth.

Our Fence Contractor Services

No matter your property, there's a fence for that

Own a home? You’re probably after a blend of aesthetics and privacy. That’s why our residential fence installers always keep charm and safety at the forefront.

Running a business? Set a strong impression as soon as customers arrive. With premium options to choose from, your commercial fence installation is bound to catch attention.

Residential
Commercial

Striving for 100% satisfaction

Madison MihonkVerified Google Review
Read More
This company did a great job. They did a lot of extra things to accommodate our unique circumstances. The price was great and was done pretty quickly.
Scott RVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Best experience I’ve ever had with a contractor. On time, great work, professional and the owner/sales was onsite helping until the project was completed to my satisfaction!
L SchmidtVerified Google Review
Read More
Tanya and her crew were very professional. All of our concerns were addressed promptly and taken care of. We would highly recommend Local Choice Fence.
Casey RVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Very happy with the service! They showed up as scheduled and worked until after dark to get the job done. It looks beautiful. We will definitely call on them again and refer them.
D DeCarloVerified Google Review
Read More
Due to her professionalism and knowledge, we hired her on the spot. We couldn’t be more pleased. She went above and beyond our expectations.
Gail TVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
The 2 men worked so hard taking down old fence were so polite and hard workers. They did a great job in building an putting up the new one. They were professional and respectful.
Dan BredwellVerified Google Review
Read More
Tanya was professional, knowledgeable, and delivered what she promised. The crews workmanship was excellent as well. Couldn’t be more happy with the finished product.
Jasson OVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
They were great! They were fast and did great work! They are the first contractors who lived up to their promise since I have come to Florida.
Stacey RaischVerified Google Review
Read More
We are new to the Bushnell area and I came across Local Choice Fencing on Google. Right from the start they were professional, responsive and accommodating. I would do business with them again.
Dennis CVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
We are beyond happy with the work they preformed for us! They were very experienced and hard working and finished the job before schedule.
ErezVerified Google Review
Read More
The owner of the company really made sure that the job was done correctly and everything that needed to be fixed was fixed without any hesitation or problems! They worked with me very effectively and efficiently.
Jacqueline IVerified ImproveNet Review
Read More
Tanya was professional from start to finish. She delivered on all that she had promised: the start time, reliability, speed, price and workmanship.

F A Q

Frequently Asked Questions

When should I consider replacing my fence?

Don’t wait for your fence to collapse. Years of weather exposure and potential wood rot can impact not just your fence’s appearance but also its structural integrity.

Why not get a Free Fence Quote and gain a second pair of eyes from our fence contractor experts? They can advise whether a repair or replacement is in order, and offer insight into the affordability of a new fence.

Do you have financing options?

Absolutely. We provide a range of financing solutions to fit almost every budget, making a new fence accessible for everyone.

When can you start and finish my fencing project?

We’re proud to handle numerous fencing projects every year. Start times can vary due to factors like weather, unforeseen global events, or shipping delays.

Despite these variables, we’re dedicated to completing your project promptly without compromising on quality. Our aim? Making every client feel like our top priority.

What's the cost for a fencing project?

Just as no two cars have the same price, each fencing project is unique. Our seasoned fence specialists will guide you through various options.

Many of our fencing solutions can significantly boost your property’s value and appeal.

How can I be sure of the project's quality?

Your home is likely your most prized possession, and we recognize its importance. The work showcased on our site is a testament to our commitment.

We not only take immense pride in our craft but also back our work with guarantees. Because your home matters to us just as much.

Fence forward with confidence

Let our fencing contractor pros help you choose and install the perfect boundary for your home or business.

Get A Fence Quote
Contact Us
